title: [K-12] Specialized Course on Self-directed Learning Design Based on Nursing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Requires personalized learning support tailored to problem-solving-centered education environments reflecting real clinical scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more competency-based nursing interventions by analyzing real clinical cases
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans and achieve 80% or more of their weekly learning objectives
Learners can construct an integrated knowledge system for solving non-routine clinical problems using a constructivist approach
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
